author: James Tanner
method: Place the chicken in a small bowl and add the soy sauce, orange zest and olive oil. Leave aside for five minutes to marinate. Thread each chicken mini-fillet onto a skewer. Heat a griddle pan and fry the chicken skewers for three minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 4 chicken mini-fillets,  1 tbsp soy sauce,  1 orange, zest only,  2 tbsp olive oil,  You'll need 4 wooden skewers, soaked in water for ten minutes before using
